The saints solace: or, The condition, and consolation of the saints in the earth Deliuered in certaine sermons at Eatonbridge in Kent. By the minister there. Saints solace Bostock, Peter.
[10], 234 p.
Printed by Iohn Hauiland for Robert Bostocke, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings head, London : 1630.
Dedication signed: Peter Bostock. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
